mapper.insert: insert into tbl_expand( date, type, money, message) values ( #{date}, #{type}, #{money}, #{message})
mapper.update: update tbl_expand set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, date, type, message, money from tbl_expand where date between #{dateBegin} and #{dateEnd} and delete_flag != 1 limit #{start}, #{end}
select id, date, type, message, money from tbl_expand where type = #{type} and delete_flag != 1 limit #{start}, #{end}
